description.value:
This blade exudes a faint hum that grows louder as its quarry weakens.

1st Level: Any damage-dealing weapon ability using this weapon deals an extra [[/damage 1 psychic]] damage, or an extra [[/damage 2 psychic]] damage if the target is winded. Additionally, the first time in an encounter that you cause an enemy to become winded with an ability using the weapon, you gain [[/heal 10 temp]].

5th Level: The weapon’s extra psychic damage increases to [[/damage 2 psychic]], or to [[/damage 4 psychic]] if the target is winded. Additionally, whenever you cause an enemy to become winded with an ability using the weapon, you [[/gain 2 surges]] that you can immediately spend.

9th Level: The weapon’s extra psychic damage increases to [[/damage 3 psychic]], or to [[/damage 6 psychic]] if the target is winded. Additionally, you gain an edge on any ability using the weapon against any winded target.

project.prerequisites: The skull of a convicted criminal
